mapper.select: select * from (select ceil(rownum / 15) as pageNo, b.* from board_view b) where pageNo = #{pageNo}
mapper.insert: insert into board(bno, title, writer, content, bcount) values(board_bno.nextval,#{title},#{writer},#{content},0)
mapper.update: update board set title=#{title} ,content=#{content} where bno = #{bno}
mapper.delete: delete from board_like where bno = #{bno} and id = #{id}
delete from board_hate where bno = #{bno} and id = #{id}
mapper.update: update board set bcount = bcount + 1 where bno = #{bno}
mapper.delete: delete from board_comment_like where cno = #{cno} and id = #{id}
delete from board_comment_hate where cno = #{cno} and id = #{id}
